text: Hunrut was the [[minotaur]] master of the fortress now known as [[Turakbar's Fist]] in [[Droaam]], before the imprisoned [[Kethelrax the Cunning]] convinced [[Rhesh Turakbar]] to slay and supplant him.
title: Hunrut
tags: deceased barbarian minotaur monstrosity [[Turakbar's Fist]] [[Blood Horns]]
